Cards.Name: Harbinger
Cards.SpecialText: Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.
Cards.FullText: Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.

Cards.Name: Merchant
Cards.SpecialText: The first tim eyou play a Silver this turn, +1 Coin.
Cards.FullText: The first tim eyou play a Silver this turn, +1 Coin.

Cards.Name: Vassal
Cards.SpecialText: Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.
Cards.FullText: Discard the top card of your deck. If it's an Action card, you may play it.

Cards.Name: Poacher
Cards.SpecialText: Discard a card per empty Supply pile.
Cards.FullText: Discard a card per empty Supply pile.

Cards.Name: Bandit
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.
Cards.FullText: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed Treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.

Cards.Name: Sentry
Cards.SpecialText: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.
Cards.FullText: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Cards.Name: Artisan
Cards.SpecialText: Put a card from yoru hand onto your deck.
Cards.FullText: Put a card from yoru hand onto your deck.
